00043 #ifndef AI_DEFAULTIOSTREAM_H_INC
00044 #define AI_DEFAULTIOSTREAM_H_INC
00045 
00046 #include <stdio.h>
00047 #include <assimp/IOStream.hpp>
00048 #include <assimp/importerdesc.h>
00049 #include <assimp/Defines.h>
00050 
00051 namespace Assimp    {
00052 
00053 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 class ASSIMP_API DefaultIOStream : public IOStream
00060 {
00061     friend class DefaultIOSystem;
00062 #if __ANDROID__
00063 # if __ANDROID_API__ > 9
00064 #  if defined(AI_CONFIG_ANDROID_JNI_ASSIMP_MANAGER_SUPPORT)
00065     friend class AndroidJNIIOSystem;
00066 #  endif // defined(AI_CONFIG_ANDROID_JNI_ASSIMP_MANAGER_SUPPORT)
00067 # endif // __ANDROID_API__ > 9
00068 #endif // __ANDROID__
00069 
00070 protected:
00071     DefaultIOStream();
00072     DefaultIOStream(FILE* pFile, const std::string &strFilename);
00073 
00074 public:
00076     ~DefaultIOStream ();
00077 
00078     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00080     size_t Read(void* pvBuffer,
00081         size_t pSize,
00082         size_t pCount);
00083 
00084 
00085     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00087     size_t Write(const void* pvBuffer,
00088         size_t pSize,
00089         size_t pCount);
00090 
00091     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00093     aiReturn Seek(size_t pOffset,
00094         aiOrigin pOrigin);
00095 
00096     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00098     size_t Tell() const;
00099 
00100     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00102     size_t FileSize() const;
00103 
00104     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00106     void Flush();
00107 
00108 private:
00109     //  File data-structure, using clib
00110     FILE* mFile;
00111     //  Filename
00112     std::string mFilename;
00113 
00114     // Cached file size
00115     mutable size_t mCachedSize;
00116 };
00117 
00118 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 inline DefaultIOStream::DefaultIOStream () :
00120     mFile       (NULL),
00121     mFilename   (""),
00122     mCachedSize(SIZE_MAX)
00123 {
00124     // empty
00125 }
00126 
00127 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 inline DefaultIOStream::DefaultIOStream (FILE* pFile,
00129         const std::string &strFilename) :
00130     mFile(pFile),
00131     mFilename(strFilename),
00132     mCachedSize(SIZE_MAX)
00133 {
00134     // empty
00135 }
00136 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00137 
00138 } // ns assimp

00140 #endif
